name: Yoga
description: Relax and improve flexibility with our yoga sessions.
how_to_join: Sign up online or show up to the first session.
meeting_times: Saturdays at 8 AM in the wellness center

name: Gymnastics
description: Develop your flexibility, strength, and gymnastics skills.
how_to_join: Sign up at the gym or contact the coach.
meeting_times: Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays at 5 PM in the gym

name: Table Tennis
description: Play table tennis casually or join our team.
how_to_join: Register at the student union or email us.
meeting_times: Mondays and Wednesdays at 6 PM in Room 102

name: Running Club
description: For runners of all levels. Join us for weekly runs!
how_to_join: Sign up at the sports office or join our Facebook group.
meeting_times: Sundays at 7 AM at the track

name: Volleyball
description: Join our volleyball team for fun and competitive play.
how_to_join: Register at the sports center or email the team coach.
meeting_times: Tuesdays and Thursdays at 6 PM in the gym

name: Tennis
description: Improve your tennis skills or learn from scratch.
how_to_join: Register at the sports office or email the coordinator.
meeting_times: Wednesdays and Saturdays at 3 PM on the tennis courts

name: Basketball
description: Join our competitive and friendly basketball team!
how_to_join: Sign up during club fair or contact the coach.
meeting_times: Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5 PM in the gym

name: Soccer
description: Open to all skill levels. Come and play soccer with us!
how_to_join: Register online or speak to the team captain.
meeting_times: Mondays and Fridays at 4 PM on the main field

name: Swimming
description: Join the swim team or simply enjoy recreational swimming.
how_to_join: Sign up at the swimming pool or contact the coach.
meeting_times: Daily from 6 AM to 8 AM at the swimming pool

name: Badminton
description: Join our badminton club for casual and competitive play.
how_to_join: Register at the sports office or join us in the gym.
meeting_times: Tuesdays and Thursdays at 7 PM in the gym
